purpose: To provide a customizable AI agent that allows users to interact with their computers and applications through natural language.
principle: Leverages the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to facilitate natural language understanding and execution of commands across various applications and systems.
reusability: Offers plug-and-play capabilities with support for custom extensions, allowing integration with various applications through MCP.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential bugs. Designed for experimentation and development rather than production use.
name: saiki
description: A customizable, general purpose AI Agent that supports MCP. Talk to Saiki in natural language to control computers, applications and more!
highlight: Enables natural language interaction to control computers and applications using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
